message.content:
The task is to find the line item that corresponds to the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life in the cash flow statement. This is depreciation.

Looking at the provided cash flow statement:

| Account                      | Amount    | Date       |
|-----------------------------|-----------|------------|
| Depreciation                | 92870.67  | 2024-02-05 |

The depreciation value is 92870.67, which represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "92870.67"}}
```
